summary: Hello, my name is Sydney Hass and I am a software developer working on a mission critical Java Spring application at the Bank of Canada. I am always looking for opportunities to learn new skills and work with different technology stacks. Working from home and my growing family have given me a new perspective on my life goals so I am looking to move into a fully remote position. üë©‚Äçüíª In my short career, I shaped the documentation for my team and enhanced our onboarding experience, receieved acknowledgements for my ability to clearly and concisely present information, and was noiminated for an Award of Excellence for my work as part of a team development project at the Bank of Canada. When I'm not working you can find me carrying my baby around, walking my dog, or tending to my garden. Please reach out if you want to discuss any interesting opportunities. ‚úåÔ∏è

experience.description: Working to maintain and develop a mission critical Java Spring web application. Added new features for handling business transactions using test-driven development practices. Developed a process for sharing information between experienced developers and new hires.

Used Java and Selenium to perform automated testing to ensure the integrity of a mission critical application. Created a wiki for storing information about tools, processes, and recurrent test plans. Developed a tool for integrating manual test cases into our existing automated report generator and improved the recording of automated test cases.

Responsible for supporting a variety of Commerical-off-the-shelf (COTS) applcations, such as Jira, Confluence, and ServiceNow. Implemented custom workflows in Jira and ServiceNow. Simplified an existing process for requesting new software within the Bank of Canada.

projects.name: Gatsby resume starter
projects.description: Gatsby resume tailwind is a free starter template with  Netlify CMS implementation. It is easy to customize the design with thanks to tailwind theming capabilities. It uses git as a backend and can be deployed to any static hosting service like Netlify, firebase hosting or Github pages.
